body: Thanks for opening your first issue here! üéâ Be sure to follow the issue template! If you need help or want to chat with us, join us on Discord https://gofiber.io/discord

issue.title: üöÄ  add 405 method not allowed handler

repository.name: fiber
repository.description: ‚ö°Ô∏è Express inspired web framework written in Go

issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem?**
No

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Assuming that we have code like: 
```go
app := New()

app.Setting.HandleMethodNotAllowed = true

app.Post("/path", func(ctx *Ctx) {
	ctx.Send("hello")
})

app.Listen(3000)
```

and when we use the wrong method:
```
curl localhost:3000/path -I
> HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
> Date: Sat, 20 Jun 2020 08:54:13 GMT
> Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
> Content-Length: 18
```

**Additional context**
- This feature will not bring breaking changes
- More friendlier to users
- Users can provide custom handler to handle 405

body: Please go to middleware to post the issue

issue.title: üîß fix #556

repository.name: fiber
repository.description: ‚ö°Ô∏è Express inspired web framework written in Go

issue.body:
This PR will fix #556 

When a middleware route matched, app treated the request as matched also.

~~Fiber should distinguish between mw match and actual route match.~~

issue.title: üåø v1.12.x Changelog

repository.name: fiber
repository.description: ‚ö°Ô∏è Express inspired web framework written in Go

issue.body:
üî• **New** - - [ctx.Route().Params](https://docs.gofiber.io/ctx#route) are now public https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/545 @zerbitx - [app.Settings.UnescapePath](https://docs.gofiber.io/app#settings) Converts all encoded characters in the route back before setting the path for the context, so that the routing can also work with urlencoded special characters https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/506 - Abstract [fiber.Router interface](https://godoc.org/github.com/gofiber/fiber#Router) for `App` & `Group` https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/476 - [app.Settings.ReadBufferSize](https://docs.gofiber.io/app#settings) Per-connection buffer size for requests' reading. This also limits the maximum header size. Increase this buffer if your clients send multi-KB RequestURIs and/or multi-KB headers (for example, BIG cookies). - [app.Settings.WriteBufferSize](https://docs.gofiber.io/app#settings) Per-connection buffer size for responses' writing. - [app.Settings.Views](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/blob/master/app.go#L181) We added a new template interface named `Views`, [click here to see an example](https://github.com/gofiber/template#example). _The old Template interface is still backward compatible but it does not support the [new features](https://godoc.org/github.com/gofiber/template/html)_. - Add [Taiwanese translation](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/blob/master/.github/README_zh-TW.md) https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/517 - [c.Cookies(key string, defaultValue ...string)](https://docs.gofiber.io/ctx#cookies) pass an optional default value that returns if cookie is not found https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/541 - [c.Params(key string, defaultValue ...string)](https://docs.gofiber.io/ctx#params) pass an optional default value that returns if param is not found https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/541 - [c.Query(key string, defaultValue ...string)](https://docs.gofiber.io/ctx#query) pass an optional default value that returns if query is not found https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/541 - Add more middleware test cases, coverage 84% https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/538
üßπ **Updates** - - The hyphen (`-`) and the dot (`.`) are now interpreted literally in paths, they can be used along with route parameters for useful purposes. Thank you @ReneWerner87 ```go // http://localhost:3000/plantae/prunus.persica app.Get("/plantae/:genus.:species", func(c *fiber.Ctx) { c.Params("genus") // prunus c.Params("species") // persica }) // http://localhost:3000/flights/LAX-SFO app.Get("/flights/:from-:to", func(c *fiber.Ctx) { c.Params("from") // LAX c.Params("to") // SFO }) ``` - [ctx.Render(tmpl string, values interface{}, layout ...string) error](https://docs.gofiber.io/ctx#render) https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/441 Now supports an additional `layout string` argument. Special thanks to @bdtomlin - [gofiber/template](https://github.com/gofiber/template) bumped to `v1.5.0` - Add SECURITY.md https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/484 - Remove unnecessary badges https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/483 - [app.Prefork](https://docs.gofiber.io/app#settings) is now supported on Windows https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/502 - `app.Handler` is now accessible https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/485 https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/504 - StartupMessage is colorized and now contains more information ![](https://i.imgur.com/uLuIQQd.png) - Improve router performance https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/518 https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/518 ‚ù§Ô∏è @ReneWerner87 - Bump `gofiber/utils v0.0.9` - Add [benchmark charts](https://gofiber.github.io/fiber) for internal middleware tests - Improve `app.Listen` documentation https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/561 - Improve code coverage https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/558 @kiyonlin - Emoji Commits are now default - Improve PT translation https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/553 @fsmiamoto - Optimize `MethodNotAllowed` process https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/563 @ReneWerner87
ü©π **Fixes** - - Remove panic on invalid method override https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/493 - Child procs will exit when killing the master process https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/501 - Router will return a `405` when another method is available on the same path https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/492 - Timeout settings have been clarified https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/500 and [middleware.Timeout](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/blob/master/middleware/timeout.md) has been added https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/489 - [app.Routes()](https://docs.gofiber.io/app#routes) returns the correct path endpoints - Fix typo in compress middleware https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/513 - Avoid panic in `c.Subdomains` https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/475 - Do not use normalized path https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/482 - Fix unnecessary pass-throughs for groups https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/487 - Fix `flag.Parse()` compatibility https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/469 - Fix `SendFile` 304 cache behavior https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/516 - Correct prefork flags https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/523/commits/518902d61145bf68d1f18f8d735af98895411127 - Correct example typo https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/513 - Default to 0.0.0.0 host addr if non is given ( docker had issue's with this ) https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/539 - Allow Config files inside the default RequestID & Compress middleware initiators https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/537 - Respond with `405` for `Use` cases https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/556 - Hide the `-prefork-child` flag from `flag.Usage` https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues/522 https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/pull/542 @doingodswork

body: Hey @Aoi-hosizora , I think it‚Äôs fixed in the master branch. Please wait for the next release :smile:
